caption.p: Heparin reduced the inhibitory activity of BLF on viral attachment to target cells. (A) Representative immunofluorescence images of HCoV-OC43 attached to RD cell surface detected by immunofluorescence staining. (B) Quantification of HCoV-OC43 attached to RD cell surface detected by RT-qPCR of N gene. (C) Quantification of HCoV-NL63 attached to Vero E6 cell surface detected by RT-qPCR of N gene. #1: H 2O; #2: 500 µg/ml BLF; #3: 1000 µg/ml BLF; #4: 10 µg/ml heparin; #5: 30 µg/ml heparin; #6: 500 µg/ml BLF+10 µg/ml heparin; #7: 500 µg/ml BLF+30 µg/ml heparin. *, p < 0.05; **, p < 0.01; ***, p < 0.001 (student's t-test). All data are mean ± standard deviation of three replicates.
